website_summaries.verdict: The Urbanears Humlan is a stylish, affordable on-ear headphone pair with solid bass response for the price.
cons: Could use a little more high-mid presence

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound quality.  A tad tight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use during my gym workouts. The washable earpads and headband are a key feature, since I work up a sweat. I've had them about 6 weeks, and so far I'm happy. The fit is a tad tight. Enough to notice it after a while, but not enough to be painful. They seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: ... these to use at the gym and they work great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use at the gym and they work great for the money. I only paid $26 on Amazon for them so great bang for the buck head phones. They are pretty light weight and stay on my ears when I run. I like that most pieces come off and can be washed also. The sound quality isn't bad for a cheap set either. They sound much better then over priced beats that is for sure. Only minor complaint is they aren't red they are more of a salmon color. Over all they work great for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Are these adorable? Yes
customer_reviews.text: Are these high quality? No. Are these adorable? Yes. Will they suffice? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: ThistleMoon

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones because you can bend them slightly so they don't crush your ears. Careful of over bending. Sound is great and the male audio plug is "L" shaped so it fits in small shirt pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Raindance

customer_reviews.title: Another quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Urbanears I have purchased and I have been pleased with both. Being fabric covered, they can get dirty but the design allows you to wash the coverings which is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Arrasmith88

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but thry hurt after a while
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is pretty good as well as the microphone. The added output jack is great for sharing your music or movies with people if you are traveling, etc. The only problem is that after 1 hour, they start feeling uncomfortable. Like I get this pain in my ear idk why.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Colours don't match.
customer_reviews.text: The real colour absolutely doesn't match to the colour on the picture. It seems that the item should be red but in reality headphones are pale pink. It was so unexpected that I sold it after delivery but sound was anyways of highest quality. So, be careful before buying Tomato Red.
customer_reviews.author: Levani

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable to wear but sound quality is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: urban ears
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I brought these as a gift and got no complaints. The fact that these can be washed is great.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to return because I bought the warranty but they somehow took it away. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Baklanov

customer_reviews.title: Look tiny but really sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for working out. Love that you can wash both the band and the earphones. Look tiny but really sound great
customer_reviews.author: Hope Brewster

customer_reviews.title: The headphones ended up being much smaller than the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones ended up being much smaller than the picture and did not fit well, which lead to my ears hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kolbe

customer_reviews.title: painful!!
customer_reviews.text: My ears get red after like 15 minutes of wearing these. They just pinch so hard. I thought I might wear them out with time but it still hurts my ears. Too late to return, but I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: rouleaux

customer_reviews.title: good good good
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality and look awesome. The fit is quite tight so can sometimes get a bit uncomfortable. Over all a great product and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautyful and it works without problems It came a day faster than expected Trank you At last beautiful and not too big headphones for women heads
customer_reviews.author: Larissa R

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased multiple pair for the family. Comfy and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head so they don't quite fit, lol. Otherwise perfectly acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable, specially after a few hours: ears hurt. Good sound quality though.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I own these and as one other reviewer says they did hurt my ears when I wore them for a prolonged amount of time. After experiencing this, I thought that it was because I'm a very large man and so I gave it to my daughter. She doesn't take those things off and she never complained of pain as I did. The buil quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle

customer_reviews.title: fantastic color selection
customer_reviews.text: These are okay headphones. Decent sound quality, fantastic color selection. They're really small so they're great for kids or people with small heads. Don't buy these if you have an adult regular head. I prefer Skullcandy headphones for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

product_meta.title: Urbanears Humlan On-Ear Headphones, Tomato (4091039)
product_meta.description: Humlan is a brand new concept in headphones from Urbanears. Just like your favorite T-shirt, Humlan's headband and ear cushions can be removed and thrown in with the wash. Your listening experience is guaranteed to be fresh and clean, even if the music you listen to is not. Because Humlan belongs to the Urbanears family, it also comes with some handy features like the ZoundPlug for instant music sharing and a microphone and remote for picking up calls and hands-free talking.
feature_bullets: ZoundPlug - instant music sharing. Plug in a friend and share your music
Microphone and remote compatible with most devices using the unprotected 3.5mm standard
Machine washable head-band and ear cushions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars48 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
